CustomField.description: Number of days from 1st dose that this dose is to be given. If this record is the first dose enter 0. e.g. Dose 1 = Day 0 enter 0, If Dose 2 = Day 28 enter 28
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Number of days from 1st dose that this dose is to be given. If this record is the first dose enter 0. e.g. Dose 1 = Day 0 enter 0, If Dose 2 = Day 28 enter 28
CustomField.label: Offset
